title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Beginner Social Terminology Learning via AR-Based Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Elementary Social Concept Comprehension
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain 100 or more essential social terms in real-world contexts using AR-based simulations.
Learners achieve a monthly learning participation rate of at least 80% by utilizing gamification elements (quests, reward systems).
Learners independently create and share at least three social phenomenon analysis scenarios in an AR environment through self-generated learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
